contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title}} {{For|the sailing barge|Zebrina (ship)}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Zebrina'' | image = Zebrina detrita.jpg | image_caption = An illustration showing both a live snail and a [[gastropod shell|shell]] of ''[[Zebrina detrita]]'' | status = | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Mollusca]] | classis = [[Gastropoda]] | unranked_superfamilia = clade [[Heterobranchia]] clade [[Euthyneura]]<br/>clade [[Panpulmonata]]<br/> clade [[Eupulmonata]]<br/> clade [[Stylommatophora]]<br/> informal group [[Orthurethra]] | superfamilia = [[Enoidea]] | familia = [[Enidae]] | subfamilia = [[Eninae]] | tribus = [[Chondrulini]] | genus = '''''Zebrina''''' | genus_authority = [[Held]], 1837<ref>Held F. (1838). "Notizen über die Weichthiere Bayerns". (Fortsetzung.). ''Isis'' '''1837'''(12): 902-921. Leipzig.</ref> }} '''''Zebrina''''' is a [[genus]] of air-breathing [[land snail]]s, [[terrestrial animal|terrestrial]] [[pulmonate]] [[gastropod]] [[mollusk]]s in the family Enidae. == Species == Species in the genus ''Zebrina'' include: * ''[[Zebrina detrita]]'' (O. F. Müller, 1774) * ''[[Zebrina fasciolata]]'' (Olivier, 1801) - [[type species]] for genus ''Zebrina'' * ''[[Zebrina kindermanni]]'' (L. Pfeiffer, 1853) * ''[[Zebrina varnensis]]'' (L. Pfeiffer, 1847) ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Enidae]] {{Enidae-stub}}
